post.body: :-p RIght. Off to bed now. I hope you don't meet a jellyfish or a Holstein Squid.
*mutter* I just overcooked a duck.
Hey, you're ahead of us - you must be having sherry now - sorry , fantasising... :-)
Not you too! The tyranny of 140 characters! Twitters can be short as well as long you know...!
Hey! Yes, I have been sucked into its evil maw.
Fair enough, of course, but I hope there is chocolate at least...
Oh strike a light, a night shift? Hope you've got a discreet bottle handy? Unless you're a doctor of course :-)
Is he intending to appear over the Christmas period?
You too mate! See you for a festive rice ball soon I hope.
Flaming norah! Joking apart, do you think MobileMe is useful?
Ah, that's good.
Sorry to hear that. :-(
Aha - happy birthday Tim. xx
Having to reboot because the app says the firewall is blocking it, when the firewall is clearly allowing it to connect is pure arse.
See you tomorrow hon xx I'm watching Midsomer Murders.....
A very happy Interfaith Timezone to all my Twitter followers! xx
Hurrah! Dug up a CD compilation of xmas songs/carols that a friend made a couple of years ago. Ahh, that's better...
Anyone understand Adobe Lightroom catalogue arcana? Moving stuff round hard drives has caused a wee hissy fit. Must find the manual....
I had to reboot. Reboot, FFS!
If MS for WM were a person, it would be an unconscionable scrotard.
